key_talking_points: Florida maintains a one-goal lead over Edmonton early in the first period. The action is picking up with increased shots on goal and a recent holding penalty against Edmonton.
Edmonton will need to capitalize on the upcoming power play opportunity to tie the game.
for_commentary_agent.context: Balance play-by-play with analysis of Edmonton's power play setup and Florida's penalty kill strategy.

game_context.game_situation: Even strength, penalty just called against EDM.

high_intensity_events.summary: Penalty: EDM called for holding-the-stick at 02:54
Shot on Goal by FLA at 03:29

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus commentary on the implications of the penalty and the ensuing power play. Mention the players involved as well.
